nodes.text: A gill-flush was a service provided in Zord's Spa and Bathhouse in the coastal city of Canto Bight on Cantonica.

A gill-flush first appeared in the Star Wars Legends novel Han Solo and the Lost Legacy by author Brian Daley. It was brought into canon when it was mentioned in the reference book Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary by Pablo Hidalgo.
